name: A Dueling Room
description:
You are in a large room used for duals arcane.  The walls, ceiling and
floor all bare the scars of many fiery spells, but still look quite strong
and hold fast.
   The only exit leads north to the hallway.

exits.keywords: door small~ 1 -1 2558 S #2562 A Hallway~    You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    A doorway can be seen to the east.
